name: media-converter
title: Media Converter
description: This extension converts video, image, and audio files using ffmpeg
author: leandro.maia

commands.name: convert
commands.title: Convert Media
commands.subtitle: Media Converter
commands.description: Converts a media file to a different file format

commands.name: quick-convert
commands.title: Quick Convert
commands.subtitle: Media Converter
commands.description: Converts a media file to a different file format

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
